Understate: The claim does not understate any information or facts.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any problematic assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations.
Exaggerate: The claim does not exaggerate any information or facts.
Contradict fact: The claim does not contradict any known facts.
Falters at times: The claim does not falter at any point.
